data.name: LinkOpenActivityMonitor
data.value: Open Activity Monitor

data.value: Delete Series

data.value: Retrieve Series

data.name: MenuSendSeries
data.value: Send Series

data.name: MenuShowSeriesDetails
data.value: View Series Details

data.name: MessageCannotSendSeriesScheduledForDeletion
data.value: Series scheduled for deletion cannot be sent.

data.name: MessageConfirmDeleteEntireStudy
data.value: Deleting the remaining series will cause the entire study to be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete the entire study?

data.name: MessageConfirmDeleteSeries
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the selected series?

data.name: MessageConfirmSendToMultipleServers
data.value: You have selected multiple servers to send to. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageFailedToDeleteSeries
data.value: Failed to initiate deletion of the series.

data.name: MessageFailedToRetrieveSeries
data.value: Failed to initiate retrieving of the selected items.

data.name: MessageFailedToSendSeries
data.value: Failed to initiate sending of the selected items.

data.name: MessageFormatConfirmDeleteSeries
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the {0} selected series?

data.name: MessageFormatDeleteSeriesScheduled
data.value: The deletion of {0} series in the study for {1} [{2},A#:{3}] has been scheduled.

data.name: MessageFormatRetrieveSeriesScheduled
data.value: The retrieve of {0} series for {2} [{3},A#:{4}] from {1} has been scheduled.

data.name: MessageFormatSendSeriesScheduled
data.value: The send of {0} series to {1} for {2} [{3},A#:{4}] has been scheduled.

data.name: MessagePartialStudyWarning
data.value: Deleting series may result in partial study data, which could lead to patient misdiagnosis.

data.name: MessageRetrieveDicomServerServiceNotRunning
data.value: Failed to retrieve the selected series because the DICOM Server service is not running. Please ensure the ClearCanvas Service is running or contact your system administrator for assistance.

data.name: MessageSelectDestination
data.value: Please select a destination.

data.name: MessageSelectSeriesNotAlreadyScheduledForDeletion
data.value: Please select series that are not already scheduled for deletion.

data.name: MessageSendDicomServerServiceNotRunning
data.value: Failed to send the selected studies because the DICOM Server service is not running. Please ensure the ClearCanvas Service is running or contact your system administrator for assistance.

data.name: MessageStudyInUse
data.value: The selected study is currently in use. Please close all relevant workspaces before deleting.
